rule: all citizens are entitled to human rights
negative rights: the right to not be murdered
the right to not be stolen from
positive rights: the right to not have freedom of movement restricted unnecessarily
the right to practice any religion
the right to be left alone
the right to have basic needs met
the right to collective health care
the right to not be insulted

rights: the right to equal application of the rules
the right to force performance of duties
the right to run for office

rule: some people are more equal than others
